title: BRIEF-Rimfire Pacific Mining Gets Approval To Start Aircore & Slimline RC Drilling On Few Prospects
text:
BRIEF-Rimfire Pacific Mining Gets Approval To Start Aircore & Slimline RC Drilling On Few Prospects

Stock Markets 25 minutes ago (Sep 13, 2019 18:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Rimfire Pacific Mining Gets Approval To Start Aircore & Slimline RC Drilling On Few Prospects Sept 13 (Reuters) - Rimfire Pacific Mining N L : * GETS APPROVAL TO START AIRCORE & SLIMLINE RC DRILLING ON NORTHERN GOLD, NORTHERN AREA AND SOUTHERN AREA PROSPECTS

BRIEF-Rimfire Pacific Mining Gets Approval To Start Aircore & Slimline RC Drilling On Few Prospects
